>>> import subprocess
>>>
>>> try:
...     output = subprocess.run(["where", "python"], check=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
...     print("✅ Python subprocess can execute system commands:", output.stdout)
... except FileNotFoundError:
...     print("❌ Python subprocess CANNOT execute system commands.")
...
✅ Python subprocess can execute system commands: C:\Program Files\Python312\python.exe

>>>

Is the issue maybe with gcloud/SDK/CLI install? Before going nuclear? I also have a Mac, but it is like 10 years old that I could use for this.
